SEARCH
Package gw.api.financials

Class ClaimFinancialsTransactionsOption

java.lang.Object
gw.api.financials.ClaimFinancialsTransactionsOption
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClaimFinancialsTransactionsOption.CustomOption
public class ClaimFinancialsTransactionsOption extends Object
Represents the filtering options used on the ClaimFinancialsTransactions page. Each filter option restricts the list of transactions found on a claim by type or, for the custom filter option, by id. Each option also has a corresponding list view mode, used to select the appropriate list view for displaying the filtered transactions
Author:
John Donahue

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    ClaimFinancialsTransactionsOption.CustomOption
    Implements the special Custom option, which allows all transaction types but restricts the transactions to just those whose ids are specified in a given list, stored in the user's session.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final ClaimFinancialsTransactionsOption
    ALL
    ClaimFinancialsTransactions filtering option that shows all transactions, no matter what their subtype
    static final ClaimFinancialsTransactionsOption.CustomOption
    CUSTOM
    ClaimFinancialsTransactions custom filtering option - filters based on set of transaction ids stored in session
    static final ClaimFinancialsTransactionsOption
    PAYMENT
    ClaimFinancialsTransactions filtering option that shows all payments (checks)
    static final ClaimFinancialsTransactionsOption
    RECOVERY
    ClaimFinancialsTransactions filtering option that shows all recoveries
    static final ClaimFinancialsTransactionsOption
    RECOVERY_RESERVE
    ClaimFinancialsTransactions filtering option that shows all recovery reserves
    static final ClaimFinancialsTransactionsOption
    RESERVE
    ClaimFinancialsTransactions filtering option that shows all reserves

  • Method Details

    • getUiMode

      public String getUiMode()
      UI mode used to select the appropriate list view for displaying transactions filtered by this option.
      Returns:
      String containing the name of the mode associated with the listview for this filtering option.

    • getTransactionsQuery

      public IQueryBeanResult<TransactionView> getTransactionsQuery(Claim claim)
      Retrieves proper set of transactions for the claim, filtered by this option. According to the option, this may be all transactions, or only a particular subtype, like Payments, Reserves, etc., or from a custom query stored in the claim session state.
      Returns:
      QueryProcessor of TransactionViews

    • saveOption

      public void saveOption(Claim claim)
      Set this option as the current option in the session state for the given claim, so it will be pre selected when the user next visits the claim's financials transactions page.

      Overrides:
